text: geuga malhagil “jeoui junim! jeoleul wihae jingpyoleul dueo jusibsio.” geubunkkeseo malsseumhasigil “geudaeui jingpyoneun geudaega sam-il dong-an susinholeul je-oehagon salamdeul-ege mal-eul haji moshaneun geos-ila. geuleoni jeonyeoggwa achim-e geudae junim-eul manh-i tteoolligo chan-yanghala.”
